mapper.insert: INSERT INTO subscriptions (renewal_ts, user_id, hash_tag_id, subscription_lat, subscription_lon) values (NOW(),#{user.id},#{topic.id},#{location.latitude},#{location.longitude})
mapper.sql: SELECT s.subscription_id as id, TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, NOW(), s.renewal_ts + ) as timeToLive, s.subscription_lat as subscriptionLatitude, s.subscription_lon as subscriptionLongitude, u.user_id as userId, u.fb_profile_id as userFacebookProfileId, u.screen_name as userScreenName, u.last_activity as userLastActivity, u.last_lat as userLastLatitude, u.last_lon as userLastLongitude, p.broadcast_loc as preferencesBroadcastLocation, p.show_profile_pic as preferencesShowProfilePicture, h.hash_tag_id as hashTagId, h.display_name as hashTagDisplayName
FROM subscriptions s INNER JOIN users u ON s.user_id = u.user_id INNER JOIN user_preferences p ON p.user_id = u.user_id INNER JOIN hash_tags h ON s.hash_tag_id = h.hash_tag_id
